name: OrderShipmentList
description: Get list of shipments by orders.

order_id.description: Retrieves shipments specified by order id

page_cursor.description: Used to retrieve entities via cursor-based pagination (it can't be used with any other filtering parameter)

start.description: This parameter sets the number from which you want to get entities

count.description: This parameter sets the entity amount that has to be retrieved. Max allowed count=250

params.description: Set this parameter in order to choose which entity fields you want to retrieve

response_fields.description: Set this parameter in order to choose which entity fields you want to retrieve

exclude.description: Set this parameter in order to choose which entity fields you want to ignore. Works only if parameter `params` equal force_all

created_from.description: Retrieve entities from their creation date

created_to.description: Retrieve entities to their creation date

modified_from.description: Retrieve entities from their modification date

modified_to.description: Retrieve entities to their modification date
